channel.title: Deep Learning on Rachid. Zeghlache
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on Rachid. Zeghlache

item.title: Deep Learning for Retinal Degeneration Assessment: The MARIO AMD Progression Challenge
item.description: A comprehensive analysis of the MARIO challenge held at MICCAI 2024, evaluating AI algorithms for detecting and monitoring age-related macular degeneration progression using OCT imaging.

item.title: Machine Learning for Computational Biology
item.description: Developing novel machine learning approaches to solve challenging problems in computational biology.

item.title: Neural ODEs for Disease Progression Modeling
item.description: Developing Neural Ordinary Differential Equations to model and predict diabetic retinopathy progression.
